name: Witch Hunter (WIP)
description:
You are Endres, a Witch Hunter in a fictive medieval village, in a german forest. Explore this spooky forest and uncover it's secrets.  Your only tool is your torch, so keep it burning... 

CONTROLS:

   F/Right Mouse Button: Use Torch

   E/Left Mouse Button: Interact (Destroy Shrines/Read Letters)

Note:

This is a students project. 

***ITS WORK IN PROGRESS AT THE MOMENT***

Languages: English, German

DOWNLOAD:

Just follow the Link and download the folder. In there You will find the Game.

Download-Link:

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1SDoCNewoWfbFKGPNIu4GjNmVHhPTZhNi
